article_title: Obama Immigration Move May Aid Eldercare Worker Shortage

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Advocates for the aging and their health care workers, particularly in the nursing home and long-term care industry, say President Obama’s move to grant work permits for up to five million undocumented immigrants and shield them from deportation may bring at least “some temporary relief’’ to seniors and people with [...]
